status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Over this 6‑hour window, the turbine spent all 37 ten‑minute intervals in a Downtime state, with power essentially flat and near rated (mean 0.9755, extremely low variability) despite steady mean winds (15.74 m/s). Operational signals show limited mechanical variation (rotor RPM std 0.0; generator RPM low std 0.31) with moderate pitch (mean 10.65°) and low yaw misalignment (mean 1.58°), while anomalies include a large wind-speed spike (max 36.8 m/s), persistent negative power residual (mean −0.1117; power_deficit tag), and elevated temperature levels (mean 67.03; elevated_temps tag) alongside high_wind conditions.
